long_description: we offer complete residential plumbing services, including common repairs, drain cleaning, water heater installations, and everything in between. located in gardendale, alabama, we service the surrounding communities in jefferson county, shelby county, cullman county, and blount county. for any repair or installation, big or small, magnolia plumbing has you covered. we are a locally owned small business with over a decade of combined experience.
